title: Project-Based Knowledge Integration and Language Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic project management knowledge and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Knowledge integration learning through collaboration and language use among team members in a virtual project environment

learning_goals: Learners establish and explain shared goals (cognitive and social capital) among team members in a project-based simulation environment
Learners apply at least three language strategies to build trust relationships (relational social capital) in VR-based collaborative tools
Learners achieve exploratory (developing new language expressions) and applicative (applying existing language systems) learning outcomes by integrating team knowledge into project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
